weka.classifiers.bayes

Class CFWNB

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.bayes.CFWNB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Classifier, BatchPredictor, CapabilitiesHandler, CapabilitiesIgnorer, CommandlineRunnable, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler, TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class CFWNB
extends AbstractClassifier
implements TechnicalInformationHandler
    Contructs Correlation-based Feature Weighted Naive Bayes (CFWNB).

    For more information refer to:

    L. Jiang, L. Zhang, C. Li and J. Wu, "A Correlation-based Feature Weighting Filter for Naive Bayes," in IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering. doi: 10.1109/TKDE.2018.2836440

    BibTeX: 

     @@article{Jiang2018,
   author = "Jiang, L. and Zhang, L. and Li, C. and Wu, J.",
   title = "A Correlation-based Feature Weighting Filter for Naive Bayes",
   journal = "IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering",
   doi = "10.1109/TKDE.2018.2836440",
   year = "2018"
 }

    Valid options are: 

     -D
  If set, classifier is run in debug mode and
  may output additional info to the console
    Version:
    $Revision: 5928 $
    Author:
    Liangxiao Jiang (ljiang@cug.edu.cn)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
